name: Thora Ironforge
backstory: Born in the mountain halls of Ironforge, Thora left her clan after a prophetic dream showed her the world covered in eternal winter. She seeks to prevent this fate and prove that even the smallest person can change the course of the future.

recent_quote.text: By my beard, we'll see this prophecy undone!
recent_quote.context: Before charging into the frost giant's lair
